Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 434 OVI; Willful Misconduct; Speed

434.01 DRIVING OR PHYSICAL CONTROL WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE; EVIDENCE.

434.02 RECKLESS OPERATION ON STREETS, PUBLIC OR PRIVATE PROPERTY.

434.025 REASONABLE CONTROL.

434.03 MAXIMUM SPEED LIMITS; ASSURED CLEAR DISTANCE AHEAD.

434.04 STOPPING VEHICLE; SLOW SPEED; POSTED MINIMUM SPEEDS.

434.05 SPEED LIMITATIONS OVER BRIDGES.

434.06 SPEED EXCEPTIONS FOR EMERGENCY OR SAFETY VEHICLES.

434.07 STREET RACING PROHIBITED.

434.08 VEHICULAR HOMICIDE AND MANSLAUGHTER.

434.09 OPERATION IN VIOLATION OF IMMOBILIZATION ORDER.

434.10 APPROACHING A STATIONARY PUBLIC SAFETY, EMERGENCY OR ROAD SERVICE VEHICLE.

434.11 TEXTING WHILE DRIVING PROHIBITED.
